field.name: summary
field.value: SearchFormComponent Compile error when targeting .Net 2.0 framework

field.name: description
field.value: SearchFormComponent Compile error when targeting .Net 2.0 framework. Automatic properties will work in .Net 3.5 framework, but you will get a compile error if you are stuck targeting .Net 2.0 framework. This addressing .Net 2.0 framework compile error.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: We no longer support .NET 2.0, patch not applied.
